post.body: ooOOo! Thank you!
I combined another site with my biz site and apparently it was an excellent move. Now I'm just trying to figure out the data!
I'm the type who would like to invest, multiply, save and give...with a little dash of spending/wasting tossed in on the end.
that's a great idea, too. Thanks!
oo... you know... she DOES love to paint... now there's an idea...
(And her dad's girlfriend will HATE it - she's one of those who thinks Harry Potter is satanic and the Devil's work LOL)
she actually asked for books this year, so I'm getting those - but I like the D&D thing - oo, that's good.
yeah - she's already got one of those. And too many video games. LOL
Oh pooh. I saw it, and it wasn't that bad. There were parts that were actually so funny, I almost peed my pants. :)
you're right! Huh - my mom had always told me to was Gene Roddenberry's wife - guess she was wrong!
BTW I got my signed @garyvee book while I was away. OMG - what a great book! The way he writes is downright hilarious. Excellent read.
anyone have any really great resources on how to use your GA data? I did something to my site, and the response has been *incredible*.
off to lunch! Hoping everyone's having a great day :)
G'morning Twitterverse! I took two weeks off and I'm back with a fresh start today. Hope everyone had a great holiday and a Happy New Year!
Still enjoying my 2-week Christmas vaca :) However, I'm also working on a new site launch and revamping my biz methods. Woo-hoo!
Really, really quickly - just popping in to say "Merry Christmas" to everyone! Hope you all are having a terrific holiday!
Did anyone else hear it snowed in *Vegas* yesterday? My husband said they got like 3 inches and it shut everythign down. Wow!
WOO-HOO! IT'S SNOWING!!!
Yay! Snow is coming! We're supposed ot get a storm rolling in - 1" an hour. Yay SNOW!! (Hope it stays so I have a white Christmas!)
Good morning everyone! Question: what do you get a 14-year-old girl (who's more like a tomboy) for Christmas?
